programme.title: ALF: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A mayonnaise shortage leads the Shumway family to try raising giant slugs.

programme.title: ALF: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Gordon wreaks havoc while housesitting for Madame Pokipsi.

programme.title: ALF: The Animated Series
programme.sub-title: Skipper's Got a Brand New Dad
programme.desc: Gordon and Rick discover that Skip is an orphan, and they try to find his birth parents.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: ALF and his friends portray an amusing fight against injustice in a jazzed-up version of the classic tale, "Robin Hood", which is considered one of the best in English folklore.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: ALF and his friends showcase the magic of true love, a silly battle of good vs evil, and a strangely funny twist in a gender-reversed version of "Sleeping Beauty".

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: ALF and his friends give a glass-shattering twist to the classic, "Cinderella", by bringing rock 'n' roll, an absent-minded father, and a different kind of fairy godmother into the picture.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: Ichabod Crane works with a newspaper, and seems to have solved the mystery of the headless horseman in ALF's version of "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow."

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: Jack uses magical beans to revive his mother's motel business and ends up finding love in an Alfred Hitchcocked version of "Jack and the Beanstalk."

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: Staggering under failures, the Aladdin brothers wind up in a desert amid a tour and stumble upon a magic lamp that houses a genie in a modern retelling of a popular middle-eastern folk tale.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: ALF and his friends present Rapunzel as a long-haired rap-singing beauty with vision-correcting tears in an amusing version of the classic fairytale.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: ALF and his friends turn "Rumpelstiltskin" into a modern-day work of detective fiction wherein the protagonist seeks an investigator's help to find out the name of a mystical creature.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: In a strangely entertaining version of "The Princess and the Pea", ALF and his friends present the story of a prince who finds love while pursuing comedy as a career.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: John Henry becomes an extraordinary chef pitted against a cooking machine in ALF's entertaining version of the popular American folklore.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: In an entertaining version of "The Three Little Pigs", ALF and his friends stick to the central plot of young piggies trying to build the best kind of houses.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: ALF goes down an elevator shaft instead of a rabbit hole, and enters a magical place to find all kinds of weirdos in his version of "Alice in Wonderland."

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: ALF and his friends add their own twist to "Peter Pan", the story of a boy who lives in a magical land, never grows up, and befriends three children of a family in the real world.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: ALF and his friends present their revamped version of the German classic, "Hansel and Gretel", wherein a brother-sister duo must save themselves from a dreadful witch.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: With little help, ALF must take on a powerful witch after he winds up in the land of Oz in an entertaining version of "The Wizard of Oz."

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: In a retelling of "The Elves and the Shoemaker", a mediator shows up to make things right when a poor guy becomes greedy and exploitative toward some happy helpers.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: ALF and his friends give the classic tale, "The Emperor's New Clothes", a hilarious makeover wherein a clothing freak emperor gets duped in the name of fashion.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.sub-title: Goldie Locks and the Three Bears
programme.desc: Goldie Locks does not realize what she is getting herself into by using someone else's house for her enjoyment in ALF'ss version of "Goldie Locks and the Three Bears."

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: ALF and his friends present their entertaining version of "Little Red Riding Hood", a 17th-century European classic tale about an unsuspecting little girl who faces a scary predator.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.sub-title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
programme.desc: ALF and his friends take the rivalry between Snow White and the evil queen to another level in an exciting version of the classic tale.

programme.title: ALF Tales
programme.desc: An Indiana Jones-like character wishes to help King Midas with the cursed touch, but there are people who don't want that to happen in ALF's amusing version of the classic tale.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: The whole story starts here as Gordon Shumway, a Melmacian who escaped his planet before it was destroyed, crash lands into the garage of the Tanner family.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF decides to have some fun while a nervous Mrs. Ochmonek (Liz Sheridan) baby-sits Brian (Benji Gregory).

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: When Lucky the cat disappears, everyone blames ALF. Stars Max Wright, Anne Schedeen.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF calls the president to address his concerns about nuclear weapons. Stars Max Wright, Anne Schedeen.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF takes a job selling cosmetics over the phone. Stars Max Wright, Anne Schedeen.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF makes his first friend outside of the Tanner family, Jodi a lonely blind girl who calls in to a radio talk show.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: Willie (Max Wright) helps homesick ALF arrange a trip to Melmac.

programme.title: ALF
programme.sub-title: Don't It Make My Brown Eyes Blue?
programme.desc: Lynn is excited because Scott wants to keep all his band equipment in the Tanners' garage. Willie is not so excited. Lynn is interested in Scott and begs for Willie to allow Scott to keep the equipment in their garage for just two days.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: On his 45th birthday, Willie (Max Wright) feels unfulfilled, so ALF suggests he go sky diving. Guest star: Joe Namath.

programme.title: ALF
programme.sub-title: Baby, You Can Drive My Car
programme.desc: ALF sells parts of his spaceship to buy Lynn (Andrea Elson) a Ferrari.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: Willie loses his temper with ALF during a family camping trip.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF convinces Willie to travel to the mountains to cut down a real Christmas tree.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF heads for the garage when Kate's mother (Anne Meara) pays a visit. Kate: Anne Schedeen.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF submits scripts to his favorite soap opera. Guest stars Anne Meara as Kate's mother.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF tries to set Dorothy up with her new neighbor, Whizzer Deaver.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: When ALF has amnesia, the Tanners try to help by reviewing past events. Stars Max Wright, Anne Schedeen.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF befriends a young Mexican immigrant. Stars Max Wright, Anne Schedeen.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF goes through a 24-hour period of bizarre behavior. Stars Max Wright, Anne Schedeen.

programme.title: ALF
programme.sub-title: Going Out of My Head Over You
programme.desc: Willie (Max Wright) talks to a psychologist (Bill Daily) about ALF.

programme.title: ALF
programme.desc: ALF thinks he witnessed a murder at a neighbor's house. Stars Max Wright, Anne Schedeen.
